item.title: About
item.description: I’m a composer, primarily, and a producer secondarily. I’m sometimes an academic and scholar. In my career, I have: Worked in retail Freelanced as a bass player Freelanced as a music journalist Studied music composition Taught bass guitar Done live sound engineering Lectured in music composition and production, along with music theory, critical theory, and other things Got a PhD in sound design and composition Written a few things critiquing the arts/scene in Australia Dabbled in computer & web programming Learned to train a weird dog Learned to cook a lot of vegan/plant-based food
